alert.note: Alert for Benson; Cavalier; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 25 at 3:21AM CST until December 27 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow of greater than 6 inches possible. * WHERE...Towner, Cavalier, Benson, Ramsey and Western Walsh Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Sunday afternoon through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate winter clothing. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Benson; Cavalier; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County
